title: Goose
description: I think she's a liar.Everyone believes Harley is some damsel in distress.But that spark in her eye?No f*ckin way.She's trouble.I know it.Problem is, I like the bad girls.The ones with a reputation.Because they're up for a good time.And Harley, well she's no angel. A devil in disguise.But once I fall for her...All hell breaks loose.
author: Savannah Rylan
